snippet.title: Pryzm (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Six friends embark on a weekend getaway only to find a mountain with an ancient secret. Can they escape its clutches?

A survival adventure mystery with turn-based combat and escape parameters that change with every new 1 to 2-hour run. A visual novel that can be played like a speedrun.

Coming soon to Windows and macOS on Steam. Wishlist at
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2725520?utm_source=yt
